products.name: Budgerigars(Budgies)
products.description: Budgies are small, colorful parrots known for their playful nature and ability to mimic speech.

products.name: Canaries
products.description: Canaries are small, vibrant songbirds renowned for their beautiful singing and bright yellow plumage.

products.name: Cockatiels
products.description: Cockatiels are friendly, medium-sized parrots with a distinctive crest, known for their affectionate nature and ability to whistle tunes.

products.name: Lovebirds
products.description: Lovebirds are small, colorful parrots known for their strong pair bonds and playful, affectionate behavior.

products.name: Finches
products.description: Finches are small, vibrant birds known for their lively songs and social behavior, making them popular, low-maintenance pets.

products.name: Parakeets
products.description: Parakeets, also known as budgies, are small, colorful, and intelligent birds that are popular as pets due to their playful nature and ability to mimic sounds and speech.

products.name: Parrotlets
products.description: Parrotlets are tiny, energetic parrots known for their bold personalities, vibrant colors, and surprising ability to mimic speech, making them popular among bird enthusiasts.

products.name: Cockatoos
products.description: Cockatoos are large, affectionate parrots known for their striking crests, expressive personalities, and strong bonds with their owners, often requiring significant attention and social interaction.
